text: Blue's Room is an American kids' puppet TV show spin-off from Blue's Clues created by Traci Paige Johnson and Angela Santomero. The show is on Nickelodeon as part of its Nick Jr. block, so it begins out as short segments on Blue's Clues episodes in Season 6. It's produced by Nickelodeon Animation Studio. == Episodes == === Series overview === === Season 1 (2004–2005) === === Season 2 (2006–2007) === Category:American television spin-offs
title: Blue's Room
